text:
[wearables-report/] 6 new commits:
[wearables-report/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/wearables-report/commits/fef2959f2774da1a1712c28a1b548316022dba31|fef2959f2774>: Testing browser history stuff.
 - gastonfig
[wearables-report/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/wearables-report/commits/08cfd54d6568930a9d44c877651f01c496d634aa|08cfd54d6568>: Removed baked includes from copied html files.
 - gastonfig
[wearables-report/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/wearables-report/commits/b7e8c7d9480cf8abc79694f277b49298ba4c81d4|b7e8c7d9480c>: Added support for browser prev & next buttons on content loaded through ajax.
 - gastonfig
[wearables-report/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/wearables-report/commits/a52b04e3eac3f1fb38f22f77a35228d6b0747c57|a52b04e3eac3>: Main JS file reorg and better comments.
 - gastonfig
[wearables-report/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/wearables-report/commits/3c565ddfccef777072d9bb23c1bf99d7511f63b8|3c565ddfccef>: Merged AJAX branch: Removed baked includes from copied html files.
 - gastonfig
[wearables-report/] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/wearables-report/commits/5d4912a3363f4e0d988f6a3b6c8cc4e2512fff38|5d4912a3363f>: Main JS file reorg and better comments.
 - gastonfig
hey guys - welcome to this week

question: I know we sent out a tweet about wearables friday, did we want to send out anything else today? In addition to a possible additional tweet - I was thinking that Linked in might be a good place to post something (if we haven’t already that is)

I'm open to anything really. I think another tweet today is a great idea. I haven't already posted on LinkedIn but if you think we should we can do so. There aren't other posts on LinkedIn so it's more of a question of whether we want to start posting there as well as other platforms moving forward. Otherwise my fear is that it will be the lone LinkedIn post for quite a while.
My 2 cents, it looks like LinkedIn is becoming more and more a place for posting this type of thing so this may be a good excuse to begin posting there too.
yeah - I think linked in is for sure the right place to put this - but also think it’s a good question of how we get it there
I wonder if it would be better if I posted it from my personal account?
or if it should come from UC
I know Melissa and Karen already posted there from their personal accounts.
yes we should definitely post this to LinkedIn from the UC account
UCS
so - interesting stat: linked in traffic spent 10 times more time on the report than traffic from any other source
wow!
so - it does seem like it’s worth posting
yeah - the average visit length was like 1.30 - linked in traffic spent 10:30
the bounce rate was super low too - 20% compared to 80% from FB and 70% from twitter
it was also the lowest traffic driver, so there’s that - but it seems that on the whole it was higher quality visits
let's do it - I think this just means we should make sure to post to LinkedIn more moving forward
so it's not the only post on there for a long while
yeah - I think thats a good point
Cool. Can we wait 10-20 mins to post this site? We have a new image for social media that I need to update to the site. Will let know when that’s done.
yeah for sure - no rush
I would say any time before 11.30 is fine
justin: do you want to handle the copy + posting for that or did you want me to handle it?
I can pull something together

[wearables-report/master] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/wearables-report/commits/b3e3a595b19bd36388393655ba6fe99c635d68d7|b3e3a595b19b>: Update og:image and og:url.
 - gastonfig
The site is ready for sharing.
terrific - thanks!
that would be great, thanks justin
<@U026AP8CM|karen> has left the channel
Bye Karen, we’ll miss you.
okay I posted to Linked In. Like FB, linked isn’t terrific about surfacing non-sponsored posts, but we’ll see what happens.
thanks justin!
sure thing
hey justin can you change “turned them lose” to “turned them loose"
sigh. yes. Sorry.
np :)
stupid words.
Do we need actual new photo assets for posts to different social networks?
I can make them but probably shouldn’t if we don’t need them.
<@U026E0ZNR>: I think we got it covered.
Cool. Thanks.

 - gastonfig

 - gastonfig

[wearables-report/master] <https://bitbucket.org/uncorkedstudios/wearables-report/commits/2150b8e1e1a9a3211c48c96c370ac508bfbde2a3|2150b8e1e1a9>: Added hidden article headers for accesibility.
